nodes.text: Anic was a planet in the Anic system in the Mid Rim. Anic was the site of the Lijarak Mines, where Alliance to Restore the Republic operative Larq Thur was killed during the Lijarak Mines Incident sometime prior to 2 ABY.
The planet Anic was created for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Alliance Intelligence Reports, published in 1995. It was later listed as a Mid Rim world in the The Essential Atlas.
